data.eml:eml: A newly recognised species that has been confused with the global polyphagous pest scale insect, Coccus hesperidum Linnaeus (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Coccidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cook, Lyn G. (2017): A newly recognised species that has been confused with the global polyphagous pest scale insect, Coccus hesperidum Linnaeus (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Coccidae). Zootaxa 4320 (3): 571-591, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4320.3.10
